Label: CV
Assignment: Create your French CV, or translate the one you currently use in French. Make it review by your colleagues and by Clémence.

Label: Entretien
Assignment: Pass a French interview with Clémence, or a fellow student who feels ready. You must ask your partner to prepare questions, and agree on the job position in advance.

Label: Présentation
Assignment: One after the other, let's have a short speech (max 3min) about who we are, what we studied, what we work on, what we like and our aspirations.

Label: Vocabulaire
Name of the class: Lis un article sur le site indiqué
Assignment: Read an article on the website provided, and discuss your understanding with a student colleague

Label: Vocabulaire
Assignment: Make yourself some notes to learn the vocabulary.

Label: Vocabulaire
Assignment: Make yourself some notes to learn the vocabulary.

Label: Traduction
Assignment: Find a recipe of your country and translate it to French. Then, find a partner and exchange your recipes: you will have to explain it to him in French until he/she understands.

Label: Musique
Assignment: Take a song of your choice, and translate it to French. You might want to discuss it with your colleagues.

Label: Vocabulaire
Name of the class: Apprends le vocabulaire de la cuisine
Assignment: Learn the kitchen and cooking vocabulary, and try to apply it: make sentences describing a MasterChef episode (a moment of it) and try to be precise on what the Chefs do with their tools.

Label: Micro-trottoir
Assignment: Challenge: write a vox pops about a topic concerning a fair amount of people and ask your question in the street, as if you were recording a radio show, or doing a social science experiment.

Label: Commander
Assignment: Go to the nearest bar or cafeteria, and order something in French (everything must be said in French)

Assignment: Look at the reportage and do the exercizes.

Label: Apéro
Assignment: Translate your favourite cocktail recipe in French, and then explain it to a partner, who will do the same to you. Up to you if you also wanna taste!

Label: Corps
Assignment: Learn the different body parts with this interactive image!

Label: Corps
Assignment: Who is the student you are talking about? One after the other, describe someone (both physically and in terms of personality) and try to make everyone guess who you are talking about.

Label: LGBT
Assignment: Look at the reportage and do the exercizes.

Label: Jeu
Assignment: Le concept est ici très simple : il est demandé à chaque personne du groupe de choisir un objet qu’elle emporterait avec elle si elle devait être placée sur une île déserte. Divisez le groupe en sous-groupes aléatoires et demandez aux personnes qui les composent de travailler en équipe pour voir comment leurs objets respectifs pourraient leur servir à survivre, individuellement ou combinés.

Label: Interview
Assignment: Write a fake interview (could be for a movie star, or for a sport player) and interview a colleague who will play the character in answering your questions. You can then switch roles

Label: Vocabulaire
Assignment: Use this vocabulary to create sentences about yourself: what is your best memory in a trip? Which countries did you visit? What country would you like to visit? What was your biggest accomplishment in a trip? Your biggest fear? Then, share it with the class.

Assignment: Do the two exercizes in the website using the vocabulary.

Assignment: Watch the video attached in the webpage, and try to note down the vocabulary. Then, ask Clémence for a film excerpt recommendation or take it from the list in the Drive. Watch an excerpt from this chosen film and make a small analysis/description of the scene, written or/and orally.
